product_name: Ocean Kayak Scupper Valves - Medium - Package of 2
long_description: The Scupper Valves from Ocean Kayak take the whole concept of a scupper to the next level. Not only do the Ocean Kayak Scupper Valves help prevent water from entering the scupper holes, but they actually drain water that may have entered your boat while you paddle. The Ocean Kayak Scupper Valves are the equivalent to medium-size scupper stoppers.
short_description: The Scupper Valves from Ocean Kayak take the whole concept of a scupper to the next level.
